data.eml:eml: Five new species of genus Kisaura Ross (Trichoptera: Philopotamidae) from Himachal Pradesh (India)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pandher, Manpreet Singh, Saini, Malkiat Singh (2015): Five new species of genus Kisaura Ross (Trichoptera: Philopotamidae) from Himachal Pradesh (India). Zootaxa 4021 (2): 377-386, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4021.2.8
